pages.text: Think back to the good old days when you would set little traps for your friends: if they touched the wrong block, they would be completely buried in sand. Now your friends are not so easily fooled.\\Modern problems require modern solutions.
Behaves like a solid block until it receives a [#](449900)redstone signal[#](). The [#](449900)redstone pulse() propagates through all connected blocks and makes them fall.
